# Gelf logging plugin

# Setting up BSB

# Gelf plugin config

"log-gelf": {
  "adapterName": "udp",
  "adapterOptions": {
    "host": "127.0.0.1",
    "port": 12201,
    "family": 4,
    "timeout": 10000
  }
}
